## AbstractDevice.getVertexAttribFormat() method

Get the vertex attribute format from vertex semantic and data type

**Signature:**

```typescript
getVertexAttribFormat(semantic: VertexSemantic, dataType: DataType, componentCount: number): VertexAttribFormat;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  semantic | [VertexSemantic](doc/markdown/./device.vertexsemantic.md) | The vertex semantic |
|  dataType | [DataType](doc/markdown/./device.datatype.md) | The data type |
|  componentCount | number | The component count |

**Returns:**

[VertexAttribFormat](doc/markdown/./device.vertexattribformat.md)
